column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Really enjoyed our experience here! The food was tasty
column2: both the beef and the shrimp and grits we got were cooked wonderfully. The cocktails were pretty good too
column3: although not the best I've had
column4: but that could've just been that I wasn't a huge fan of the one I ordered
column5: others may be better. The only downsides here are that it is very loud
column6: so not great for conversations (or hearing your waiter) but the great tasting food makes up for it. I appreciated the normal portion sizes as well
column7: since so much of Texas portions are XL
column8: it's nice to eat out and feel comfortable at the end instead of stuffed.
